name: todo
description: In this project we simply use the passport google Strategy. Passport is authentication middleware for Node.js. Extremely flexible and modular, Passport can be unobtrusively dropped in to any Express-based web application. A comprehensive set of strategies support authentication using a username and password, Facebook, Twitter, and more. [reference](http://www.passportjs.org/) Before we get start  assume that you have a good knowledge of JavaScript and Nodejs. so without any further delay lets start üëç
